about_the_game:
This game features a highly dynamic background soundtrack, offering players an intense and thrilling challenge.

Players use the ASDW keys to control the movement of a cannon and the left mouse button to fire bombs, defending against incoming objects from all directions. In the game, the cannon must move flexibly, accurately aim, and destroy the incoming objects to avoid being hit. Players have three chances to make mistakes; if hit more than three times by the incoming objects, the game is over. This not only tests the player's hand-eye coordination but also requires quick reflexes and good strategic planning. The game's visuals are clean and lively, with well-designed sound effects. Each successful destruction of a target is accompanied by a satisfying explosion sound, greatly enhancing the game's fun and challenge.
